name: Solitary Suanni
desc:
These elegant and proud mystical beasts only live in mountains shrouded in adeptal energy.
Since ancient times, they have been considered a symbol of good fortune, and their preference for living aloof from the material world has been admired by intellectuals for generations. In ancient legends from Chenyu Vale, the leader of the suanni was called the Mountain Lord and was considered to be of the same standing as the adepti.
Another theory claims that the Xuanwen Beasts that roam the mountains these days are the descendants of the suanni, but that the thinning of their blood over the years has caused them to devolve into violent creatures. Although this contradicts another theory regarding the origin of Xuanwen Beasts, the few records of the suanni often show them attended by a large number of Xuanwen Beasts.
These days, the well-known Wushou Dance in Chenyu Vale came from the movements of the suanni. But since only a handful of people have actually seen such creatures, most can only imagine what they look like. After thousands of years of changes and different artistic interpretations, the Wushou Dance costume head has developed into its current style.

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Cloudseam Scale
dropMaterial.desc:
Cold and solid scales from a Solitary Suanni. They retain pure adeptal energy even after falling off and cannot be damaged by ordinary weapons.
Ordinary beasts can sometimes be affected by errant adeptal energy and become more powerful than usual. However, a suanni's adeptal energy originates from within themselves, which is why their leader is often regarded as equal to adepti.

dropMaterial.name: Vayuda Turquoise Fragment
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Still, the winds change direction."

dropMaterial.name: Vayuda Turquoise Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Still, the winds change direction.
Someday, they will blow towards a brighter future..."

dropMaterial.name: Vayuda Turquoise Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Still, the winds change direction.
"Someday, they will blow towards a brighter future...
"Take my blessings and live leisurely from this day onward."

dropMaterial.name: Varunada Lazurite Fragment
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains."

dropMaterial.name: Varunada Lazurite Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains.
I must correct you. People here bear no sins in the eyes of the gods..."

dropMaterial.name: Varunada Lazurite Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains.
I must correct you. People here bear no sins in the eyes of the gods... Only laws and the Tribunal can judge someone.
They can judge even me. So praise my magnificence and purity."

value.text: An illuminated beast that dwells deep within the mountains that can use <color=#ffe14b>Hydro</color> and <color=#ffe14b>Anemo</color> simultaneously in battle. Render it Frozen while it is gathering <color=#ffe14b>Hydro</color> -aligned adeptal energy, before using <color=#ffe14b>Shatter, Melt, or other Elemental Reactions</color> to break the ice and cause it to enter an immobile state. When it is gathering <color=#ffe14b>Anemo</color> -aligned adeptal energy, use <color=#ffe14b>attacks from Elements that can react with Anemo</color> to destroy the Spiritwind Pearls summoned during the process to achieve the same advantage.
